response.original_title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
response.overview: Based on the bestselling book series, this outrageous comedy tells the story of George and Harold,  two overly imaginative pranksters who hypnotize their principal into thinking he’s an enthusiastic, yet dimwitted, superhero named Captain Underpants.
response.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
